});

sourcesContent:
const filtersDefaultState = {
  hierarchy1: [],
  selectedHierarchy1: [],
  hierarchy2: [],
  selectedHierarchy2: [],
  hierarchy3: [],
  selectedHierarchy3: [],
  hierarchy4: [],
  selectedHierarchy4: [],
  hierarchy5: [],
  selectedHierarchy5: [],
  hierarchy6: [],
  selectedHierarchy6: [],
  hierarchy7: [],
  selectedHierarchy7: [],
  hierarchy8: [],
  selectedHierarchy8: [],
  stores: [],
  selectedStores: [],
  startDate: null,
  endDate: null,
  weeks: [],
  retainFilters: false,
  season: [],
  selectedSeason: [],
  clearance: [],
  selectedClearance: [],
  matrix: [],
  selectedMatrix: [],
  exclusionList: [],
  selectedExclusionList: [],
  styleColor: [],
  selectedStyleColor: [],
  country: [],
  selectedCountry: [],
  storeCluster: [],
  selectedStoreCluster: [],
  store: [],
  selectedStore: [],
  channel: [],
  selectedChannel: [],
  customStyleGroup: [],
  customStoreGroup: [],
  selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
  selectedCustomStyleName: [],
  selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
};

export default (state = filtersDefaultState, action) => {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'SET_STYLE_GROUPS':
      return {
        ...state,
        customStyleGroup: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_DROPS':
      return {
        ...state,
        drops: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY1':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy1: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY2':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy2: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY3':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy3: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY4':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy4: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY5':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy5: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY6':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy6: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY7':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy7: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_HIERARCHY8':
      return {
        ...state,
        hierarchy8: action.payload,
      };

    case 'SET_SEASON':
      return {
        ...state,
        season: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_CLEARANCE':
      return {
        ...state,
        clearance: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_MATRIX':
      return {
        ...state,
        matrix: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_EXCLUSION_LIST':
      return {
        ...state,
        exclusionList: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_STYLE_COLOR':
      return {
        ...state,
        styleColor: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_COUNTRY':
      return {
        ...state,
        country: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_STORE_CLUSTER':
      return {
        ...state,
        storeCluster: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_STORE_CODE':
      return {
        ...state,
        store: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_CHANNEL':
      return {
        ...state,
        channel: action.payload,
      };

    // case 'SET_STORES':
    //   return {
    //     ...state,
    //     stores: action.payload,
    //   };
    case 'SET_CUSTOM_STORES':
      return {
        ...state,
        customStoreGroup: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_DROPS':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedDrops: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_COUNTRY':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedCountry: action.payload,
        channel: [],
        selectedChannel: [],
        storeCluster: [],
        selectedStoreCluster: [],
        store: [],
        selectedStore: [],
        // hierarchy1: [],
        selectedHierarchy1: [],
        hierarchy2: [],
        selectedHierarchy2: [],
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_CHANNEL':
      return {
        ...state,

        selectedChannel: action.payload,
        storeCluster: [],
        selectedStoreCluster: [],
        store: [],
        selectedStore: [],
        hierarchy1: [],
        selectedHierarchy1: [],
        hierarchy2: [],
        selectedHierarchy2: [],
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_STORE_CLUSTER':
      return {
        ...state,

        selectedStoreCluster: action.payload,
        store: [],
        selectedStore: [],
        hierarchy1: [],
        selectedHierarchy1: [],
        hierarchy2: [],
        selectedHierarchy2: [],
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_STORE':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedStore: action.payload,
        hierarchy1: [],
        selectedHierarchy1: [],
        hierarchy2: [],
        selectedHierarchy2: [],
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY1':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy1: action.payload,
        hierarchy2: [],
        selectedHierarchy2: [],
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
        hierarchy6: [],
        selectedHierarchy6: [],
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY2':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy2: action.payload,
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
        hierarchy6: [],
        selectedHierarchy6: [],
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY3':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy3: action.payload,
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
        hierarchy6: [],
        selectedHierarchy6: [],
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY4':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy4: action.payload,
        //do not reset H5 on chnage of H4 this will cause issue for H!: accessories
        // hierarchy5: [],
        // selectedHierarchy5: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
        hierarchy6: [],
        selectedHierarchy6: [],
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY5':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy5: action.payload,
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
        hierarchy6: [],
        selectedHierarchy6: [],
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
        // customStyleGroups: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_SEASON':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedSeason: action.payload,
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_MATRIX':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedMatrix: action.payload,
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_EXCLUSION_LIST':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedExclusionList: action.payload,
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_CLEARANCE':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedClearance: action.payload,
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_EXTRAFIL_STYLE_COLOR':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedStyleColor: action.payload,
      };

    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY6':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy6: action.payload,
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
        // customStyleGroups: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY7':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy7: action.payload,
        hierarchy8: action.check ? state.hierarchy8 : [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
        // customStyleGroups: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_HIERARCHY8':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy8: action.payload,
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
        // customStyleGroups: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_STORES':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedStores: action.payload,
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_CUSTOM_GROUPS':
      return {
        ...state,
        // selectedStores: action.payload,
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: action.payload,
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SELECTED_CUSTOM_STYLE_GROUP_NAME':
      return {
        ...state,
        // selectedStores: action.payload,
        selectedCustomStyleName: action.payload,
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
      };
    case 'SET_SELECTED_CUSTOM_STORE_GROUP':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: action.payload,
      };
    case 'SELECTED_CUSTOM_STORE_GROUP_LABEL':
      return {
        ...state,
      };
    case 'SET_DATE_RANGE':
      return {
        ...state,
        startDate: action.payload.startDate,
        endDate: action.payload.endDate,
        weeks: action.payload.weeks,
      };
    case 'RESET_FILTERS':
      return {
        ...state,
        selectedHierarchy1: [],
        hierarchy2: [],
        selectedHierarchy2: [],
        hierarchy3: [],
        selectedHierarchy3: [],
        hierarchy4: [],
        selectedHierarchy4: [],
        hierarchy5: [],
        selectedHierarchy5: [],
        hierarchy6: [],
        selectedHierarchy6: [],
        hierarchy7: [],
        selectedHierarchy7: [],
        hierarchy8: [],
        selectedHierarchy8: [],
        customStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleGroup: [],
        selectedCustomStyleName: [],
        selectedStores: [],
        selectedCustomStoreGroup: [],
        startDate: null,
        endDate: null,
        weeks: [],
        season: [],
        selectedSeason: [],
        clearance: [],
        selectedClearance: [],
        matrix: [],
        selectedMatrix: [],
        exclusionList: [],
        selectedExclusionList: [],
        styleColor: [],
        selectedStyleColor: [],
        country: [],
        selectedCountry: [],
        storeCluster: [],
        selectedStoreCluster: [],
        store: [],
        selectedStore: [],
        channel: [],
        selectedChannel: [],
      };
    case 'SET_RETAIN_FILTERS':
      return {
        ...state,
        retainFilters: action.payload,
      };
    default:
      return state;
  }
};
